title: ISO Greek/Cyrillic fonts with handwritten look.
content:
Hi!

I need 2 fonts, both of which must look like handwriting: one for the Greek alphabet, and one for Russian (Cyrillic).

Text is meant to be set in 1730, in an old book.

This is a time-sensitive request -- thanks for any help you can provide!

Thanks!

Mary
author: marymacsept

comments.content:
Problem solved out of a response on the General Discussion forum! From my art director:

"Call off the handwriting, these fonts are awesome. And I can use them for future episodes, too! I LOVE FONTS."

Thanks all!

Mary McDonald-Lewis  
dialect coach  
NBC's GRIMM

I have a copper container, with 16 Old Church Slavonic?? Letters on it. YouTube vidio name is... Russian antique copper container 2.. Has close up of all the letters. Looking for translation?? Thanks Thomas.
